Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute at Madison/Spaulding
ShortDescription: #20 buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Central Park, Washington, Pulaski, and Madison, due to a street blockage near Madison/Spaulding.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Central Park, Washington, Pulaski, and Madison, due to a street blockage near Madison/Spaulding.

Allow extra travel time.
